channel.title: I need some help =)
channel.description:
I'm wanting to get a tattoo. I want the tattoo to be a symbol of the trinity.
And on the outside of it I want the ending of the prayer from The Boondock Saints (En nomeni Patri et Fili Spiritus Sancti) in Gaelic letters written around the symbol of the trinity.
That's probably really complicated/impossible, any ideas? I can't seem to find them together anywhere. [IMG]http://i17.tinypic.com/53ahm9y.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i16.tinypic.com/54bwrvo.jpg[/img]

item.title: I need some help =)
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Thats a cool tattoo,good luck Love boondock saints.

Read full topic

item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

I agree with soul, a good tattooist is an extremely talented artist, show him what you want, and see if he can make it.
